segments.text: We are approaching the top of the mountain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a beautiful view we have here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you can have a bird's-eye view of the whole city .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful . Will we have any free time there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . We will stay there for half an hour and you can do your own business .
segments.speaker: S1
